very good coop game, especially with 3 of your buddies via Headset. The first three difficulty levels (easy, normal, hard) are a walk in the park, the 4th (insane) is very challenging, even for experienced gamers and the last one (brutal) is not possible to win. You have to pick your weapons carefully for and communicate in several situations to survive as a team. Funny debriefing map, nice atmosphere and low system requirements.

8/10 points in my opinion; particular with regard, that it's free on steam

Highly recommended to play with mates as a 4 co-op, particularly as it is a free game. Requires considerable team-play, communication, and understanding of the games mechanics to progress. Maps and monsters are well made. Would happily pay money for this.
